summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to an individual with the email address jeevacation@gmail.com. Staley expresses gratitude for a recent meeting in New York City, highlighting a personal connection with a heartfelt hug. The email indicates a level of friendship and familiarity between the two individuals.
